trans-unit.source: Provides basic functionality for describing the structure of a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a funcionalidade básica para descrever a estrutura de uma fonte de dados em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Implement the IDataSourceSchema interface to describe a custom data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: Implemente a interface IDataSourceSchema para descrever uma fonte de dados personalizado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XmlDocumentSchema>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TypeSchema> classes implement the IDataSourceSchema interface.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XmlDocumentSchema>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TypeSchema>classes implementam a interface IDataSourceSchema.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TypeSchema> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XmlDocumentSchema> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema>

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement the IDataSourceSchema are used by custom control designer components to provide lists of fields and views for data-bound controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: As classes que implementam o IDataSourceSchema são usadas pelos componentes do designer de controle personalizado para fornecer a lista de campos e exibições para controles associados a dados em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of schema descriptors for views contained in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma matriz de descritores de esquema para modos de exibição contidos na fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: A class that implements the GetViews method returns an array of objects that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema> interface.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe que implementa o método GetViews retorna uma matriz de objetos que implementam o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema>

trans-unit.source: For example, in the array returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema.GetViews%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, each element of the array is a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema> object that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, na matriz retornada do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema.GetViews%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método, cada elemento da matriz é um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema>objeto que implementa <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema.GetViews%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
